creator: Video Player, Inc
descriptionHtml:
Best HD Video Player plays all the video formats smoothly. Video Player supports HD, full HD, 2k & 4K videos. You can enjoy high quality or audio on your android device. HD Video Player is a perfect multimedia player for android phone and tablet.

Video player is a best video decoder player. Video Player supports almost all video formats including AVI , MP4 , WMV , RMVB , MKV , 3GP , M4V , MOV , TS , MPG , FLV etc, just depends on your device decoder. It provides you best features to track audio & subtitle tracks. This is application easily switch to selected audio language and also switch selected subtitle language. This video player supports external videos from remote server URL.

HD Video Player with all video features is a powerful & fast video player, which you can play HD & ultra HD videos of almost all formats on your android device without any lag. HD Video Player uses the hardware decoding, with the smaller memory usage, which make your video play more faster and smoother HD playback on your android device.

HD Video Player plays original video resolution. HD Movie Video Player supports ALL video formats, 4K/ultra HD video files, and plays them with high-definition. You can lock the screen while playing video. You can save your videos in favorite playlist. You can share your videos directly to your friends through social media applications. You can add external subtitles file (SRT) while playing videos. This video player automatically recognize
srt files from SD card and internal storage.

Features:
- Automatically recognize all video playback files on your phone.
- Plays all the video formats smoothly, supports 720p, 1080p, 2k and 4k videos.
- Support remote sever URL HLS, DASH, SS, MP4 & MOV.
- Swipe controls for video seek.
- Support both phone and tablet.
- Support subtitles file (SRT).
- Browse folders directly.
- Quick start & smooth playback support.
- Quickly scan video files from SD card & Internal storage.
- Support subtitles when video file has subtitles.
- Switch audio languages while playing the video file.
- Delete and share video files.
- Support auto-rotation, aspect-ratio adjustments.
- Support to change theme of app, background theme.

Best HD Video Player is the leading free powerful Multimedia player for Android. which allows you to watch all popular video formats on your phone or tablet with hardware acceleration for faster.

Any issues and suggestions regrading this video player application:
videoplayerinc2020@gmail.com

Video Player supports almost all video formats including AVI , MP4 , WMV , RMVB , MKV , 3GP , M4V , MOV , TS , MPG , FLV etc, just depends on your device decoder. It provides you best features to track audio & subtitle tracks. This is application easily switch to selected audio language and also switch selected subtitle language. This video player supports external videos from remote server URL.

HD Video Player with all video features is a powerful & fast video player, which you can play HD & ultra HD videos of almost all formats on your android device without any lag. HD Video Player uses the hardware decoding, with the smaller memory usage, which make your video play more faster and smoother HD playback on your android device.

HD Video Player plays original video resolution. HD Movie Video Player supports ALL video formats, 4K/ultra HD video files, and plays them with high-definition. You can lock the screen while playing video. You can save your videos in favorite playlist. You can share your videos directly to your friends through social media applications. You can add external subtitles file (SRT) while playing videos. This video player automatically recognize
srt files from SD card and internal storage.

Features:
- Automatically recognize all video playback files on your phone.
- Plays all the video formats smoothly, supports 720p, 1080p, 2k and 4k videos.
- Support remote sever URL HLS, DASH, SS, MP4 & MOV.
- Swipe controls for video seek.
- Support both phone and tablet.
- Support subtitles file (SRT).
- Browse folders directly.
- Quick start & smooth playback support.
- Quickly scan video files from SD card & Internal storage.
- Support subtitles when video file has subtitles.
- Switch audio languages while playing the video file.
- Delete and share video files.
- Support auto-rotation, aspect-ratio adjustments.
- Support ac3 and eac3.

Best HD Video Player is the leading free powerful Multimedia player for Android. which allows you to watch all popular video formats on your phone or tablet with hardware acceleration for faster.
descriptionShort: HD Video player supports all types of videos, subtitles and multi audio tracks.
